1.question: Do you or any of your relatives or close friends work in advertising, market research, tobacco retailing or manufacturing?

2.question: Do you smoke packeted cigarettes at all nowadays?

3.question: About how many cigarettes do you smoke a day?

4.question: For about how long have you been smoking cigarettes?

5.question: About how old were you when you started smoking cigarettes?

6.a: What brand of cigarettes do you smoke most often?
6.b: What brand did you smoke before that one?

MainQuestionnaire.7: What other brands do you smoke from time to time nowadays?
MainQuestionnaire.8: Can you tell me the names of all the brands of cigarettes you can (OTHERS IN SECOND COLUMN) Any Others? RECORD IN SECOND COLUMN.
MainQuestionnaire.9: Apart from the brands you have mentioned, are there any others on this list you have heard of?
MainQuestionnaire.10: Which of the brands listed have you ever tried? Tried+ Rejected
MainQuestionnaire.11: Are there any others which you have heard of and which you know something about?
